import React, { useState } from 'react' const closing = () => { // alert("I am Clicked"); document.getElementById("tForm").style.display = "none"; document.getElementById("tSearch").style.display = "block"; } const Student = () => { const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert("Hi " + Name) } const [Name, setName] = useState(""); return ( <>

Teacher Entry

{ setName(e.target.value) }} />

Teacher Info

) } export default Student
